c74object.name: randomvals
c74object.description: randomvals and its audio rate counterpart (randomvals~) generate high-quality pseudorandom numbers of a flat or gaussian-based distribution between 0 and 1. The gaussian mode allows for the combination of multiple curves, each with its own parameters for mean (between 0 and 1), deviation and weight. More distributions may be added at a later stage.

method.name: int
method.description:
An int of 1 or below will give a flat distribution of values between 0 and 1.
An int of 2 or higher will give a multiple windowed gaussian distribution of values between 0 and 1.

method.name: list
method.description:
A list of three values can be sent into randomvals via a message to set gaussian distributions. The list must be formatted in the order:
mean / deviation / weight.
Multiple windowed gaussian distributions can be set by a single message by providing more sets of three values.

entry.name: float
entry.description: Outputs a high quality random float in the range of 0. to 1.
